person.persName: William Thompson Scott (Lexington, KY, 3rd KY Inf lt col & col USA and inventor)

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, trader, soldier, and inventor. Lexington, Kentucky, native. Trader with Joseph S. Scott in Lexington in 1860. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment as lieutenant colonel and colonel from October 8, 1861, to his resignation on December 7, 1862. Paymaster general of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1863 to 1865. Invented the Triplett & Scott repeating rifle with Lewis Triplett, patented in December 1864.
